sentences.en: Are you going to lie there all day , confound it, you sow! "
Confound him , what does he mean by dogging me?
sentences.cn: 该死的家伙, 他干吗老盯住我 呢 ?

sentences.en: Confound the dad - blasted water! Why didn't you tell me it was so hot?
sentences.cn: 混蛋天打雷劈的水! 为什么你刚才不告诉我水这么热 呢 ?

sentences.en: Confound you, what do you mean?
Do not confound the means with the ends.
Don't confound the means with the end.
sentences.cn: 不要把手段与目的混为一谈.

sentences.en: Don't confound the means with the ends.
sentences.cn: 不要使手段与目的混淆不清.

sentences.en: He was to preach the doctrines, and I was to confound all opponents.
sentences.cn: 他负责布道, 我则与对手辩论.

sentences.en: His amazing recovery confounded the medical specialists.
sentences.cn: 他的神奇康复使医学专家感到惊讶。

sentences.en: It is a mistake to confound strangeness with mystery.
sentences.cn: 把奇怪和神秘混为一谈,这是错误的.

sentences.en: Potter : Oh , confound it, man, are you afraid of success?
sentences.cn: 波特: 去它的吧, 老兄, 难道你害怕成功 吗 ?

sentences.en: The choice of Governor may confound us all.
sentences.cn: 州长的选择可能会让我们所有人感到困惑。

sentences.en: To confound two things means not to be able to tell them apart.
sentences.cn: 混淆两件事物的意思是说没能把它们区分开来.

sentences.en: Why don't you confound your critics and write something completely different?
sentences.cn: 那你何不让你的批评者们大吃一惊,写些完全不同的东西?

words.tran_cn: 困惑的；糊涂的；讨厌的；惊慌失措的
非常地；恼人地；十分地；混乱地
混淆（confound的ing形式）；使困惑，弄糊涂

trans.tran_cn: 使混淆，使混乱，挫败，诅咒
